metadata.othernotes:
LORE & GAME INFO
- Mia uses Psynergy. In a meta sense, Psynergy is a JRPG magic system that uses four elements, and is based on the power of the mind (made distinct from another source of power, Chi, which is 'the power of the body').
- Psynergy is based on four elements; Venus (Earth), Mars (Fire), Jupiter (Wind) and Mercury (Water).
- People who can use Psynergy are called Adepts. Mia is a Mercury Adept.
- Mercury is associated with some of the strongest healing magic in the series, and Mia was originally acting as a faith healer in her town of Imil. Renowned for her great power even at a young age, she had two apprentices of her own.
- Psynergy is treated like psychic powers/PSI - only other Adepts can see Psynergy being used, non-Adepts can only see the effects (e.g. a boulder being moved, water appearing out of nowhere). For the sake of targeted interactions in SPNATI, this limitation can be ignored.
- She is written as if three years have passed since Alchemy returned to Weyard (the ending of Golden Sun: The Lost Age). She is mentioned in Dark Dawn, which is set decades after TLA, but is not seen.

Random Trivia
- Mia is one of only two female party members in the series who can equip maces. After all, what is a mace if not just a very heavy staff?

case.name: Swimwear-Underwear
case.description: (saying the marker 'swimsuit') Mia is wearing a swimsuit under her dress, which she explains is actually an 'undergarment' for her clan (who are descended from Water elemental Adepts aka mages)

case.name: Swimsuit Top-down
case.description: (saying the marker 'swimsuit_top') Mia only 'takes off' the top half of her one-piece swimsuit. (Target the marker for this in case future costumes change the clothing.)

case.name: Setting Down A Towel
case.description: Mia will set down a towel for herself to sit on during her masturbation sequence. She has specific comments about the floor type depending on the background.

case.name: Mercury Djinn
case.description: If she is saying the marker stripped_3_fizz, then a small creature which Mia referrs to as "Fizz" has just appeared from behind her cape, and will hover around her for a few turns.

notes.note: this can go in whatever direction you want; I just find it funny that the two of them are pious and water-themed
djinn is the plural, djinni is singular
Fizz comes back if Mia is the only one who doesnt have to masturbate.
Fizz, a mercury Djinni, appears to keep Mia company if she's the only one who doesnt have to masturbate. This case plays if he didn't appear earlier.
Fizz comes back if Mia is the only one who doesnt have to masturbate.

Angelic Ankh: An Artifact that increases base Attack by 83. Its Unleash effect, Life Leech, is an attack that adds 29 damage points, is based on the Mercury element, and may add all damage done by the attack to the user's own HP meter. It is sold as an artifact in the weapon vendor at Tolbi in Golden Sun and at the weapon vendor at Apojii Islands in The Lost Age. Its buy value is 6400 coins and its sell value is 4800.
technically I made this up entirely, but Mind Read is something that a party member can do (and they are a Jupiter adept) and I'm rolling with, Mia probably met other adepts after Golden Sun 2.
This is related to a situation she can have where a mercury djinni called Fizz pops out
she can also elaborate on the Summon system that involve combining djinn together after spending their power
I'll make Fizz leave in this case. You can comment on it, or we can continue the beachwear discussion

"The Anemos (from Ancient Greek: ἄνεμος ánemos = wind) were a legendary tribe of Jupiter Adepts. They were well known for amazing Psynergy powers, such as being able to see the future as well as the ability to fly. This tribe of Wind Adepts is said to have raised its ancient city into the sky, where its underside is still visible as the moon. All modern Wind Adepts are thought to be descended from the Anemos. "
technically I made this up entirely, but Mind Read is something that a party member can do (and they are a Jupiter adept) and I'm rolling with, Mia probably met other adepts after Golden Sun 2.
technically I made this up entirely, but Mind Read is something that a party member can do (and they are a Jupiter adept) and I'm rolling with, Mia probably met other adepts after Golden Sun 2.
djinn is the plural, djinni is singular
I'm expecting a simple response like "No!" or "Completely incorrect!" lol
This may be a little wordy, but I think it fits. She's basically saying she healed it using her water magic.

Notes partially for myself: Mia comes equipped with Fizz when you get her as a party member and you can't actually 'miss' getting him. Because the Djinn were released at the start of the game, they wouldn't have actually known each other for very long by the time you recruit her.
Went with Mia thinking she's got the hang of it, then immediately misunderstanding again
chance for steve to confuse/fascinate mia with the idea of food brands and having literally millions of options for food

can be broad, vague, or specific as you like. I can work with anything. maybe narrowing it down to indiana and hawkis would work well for follow up ideas. the concept of a nation so large it has 50 states, and those states have hundreds of towns each, is mind boggling to Mia. you could even work in some cold war era propoganda lol
